verses.verse: Yea <S%H2063><s%>, at this my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2729>trembleth<s%>, And is moved <S%H5425>out<s%> of its <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, <S%H8085>oh<s%>, hear the <S%H7267>noise<s%> of his <S%H7267>voice<s%>, And the <S%H6963>sound<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
He <S%H3474>sendeth<s%> <S%H8281>it<s%> forth under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, And his <S%H216>lightning<s%> unto the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> it a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7580>roareth<s%>; He <S%H7481>thundereth<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1347>majesty<s%>; And he <S%H6117>restraineth<s%> not the lightnings when his <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%>.
God <S%H410><s%> <S%H7481>thundereth<s%> <S%H6381>marvellously<s%> with his <S%H6963>voice<s%>; Great <S%H1419>things<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H3045>he<s%>, which we cannot comprehend.

For he <S%H559>saith<s%> to the <S%H7950>snow<s%>, Fall <S%H1933>thou<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>; Likewise to the <S%H4306>shower<s%> of <S%H1653>rain<s%>, And to the <S%H4306>showers<s%> of his <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>.
He sealeth <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H120>man<s%>, That all <S%H582>men<s%> whom he hath made may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4639>it<s%>.
Then the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H1119>into<s%> <S%H4585>coverts<s%>, And <S%H7931>remain<s%> in their <S%H695>dens<s%>.
Out of the chamber of the <S%H2315>south<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> the <S%H5492>storm<s%>, And <S%H7135>cold<s%> out of the <S%H4215>north<s%>.
By the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> ice is <S%H5414>given<s%>; And the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> is <S%H4164>straitened<s%>.
Yea <S%H2959><s%>, he ladeth the thick <S%H5645>cloud<s%> with <S%H7377>moisture<s%>; He <S%H6327>spreadeth<s%> abroad the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of his <S%H216>lightning<s%>:

And it is <S%H2015>turned<s%> round <S%H4524>about<s%> by his <S%H8458>guidance<s%>, That they may <S%H6467>do<s%> whatsoever he <S%H6680>commandeth<s%> them Upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>habitable<s%> <S%H8398>world<s%>,
Whether it be for <S%H7626>correction<s%>, or for his <S%H776>land<s%>, Or for <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, that he cause it to <S%H4672>come<s%>.
Hearken <S%H238><s%> unto <S%H347>this<s%>, O Job: Stand <S%H5975>still<s%>, and <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works of <S%H410>God<s%>.
Dost thou <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7760>layeth<s%> his charge upon <S%H216>them<s%>, And causeth the lightning of his <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3313>shine<s%>?
Dost thou <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4657>balancings<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, The wondrous <S%H4652>works<s%> of him who is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in <S%H1843>knowledge<s%>?
How thy <S%H899>garments<s%> are <S%H2525>warm<s%>, When the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H8252>still<s%> by reason of the south <S%H1864>wind<s%>?
Canst thou with him spread <S%H7554>out<s%> the <S%H7834>sky<s%>, Which is <S%H2389>strong<s%> as a <S%H3332>molten<s%> <S%H7209>mirror<s%>?
Teach <S%H3045><s%> us what we shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H6186>him<s%>; For we cannot set our speech in order by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
Shall it be <S%H5608>told<s%> him that I would <S%H1696>speak<s%>? Or should a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>wish<s%> that he were swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%>?
And now men <S%H7200>see<s%> not the <S%H216>light<s%> which is <S%H925>bright<s%> in the <S%H7834>skies<s%>; But the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5674>passeth<s%>, and cleareth <S%H2891>them<s%>.
Out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H857>cometh<s%> golden <S%H2091>splendor<s%>: <S%H433>God<s%> hath upon him <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H1935>majesty<s%>.

Touching the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, we cannot find him <S%H4672>out<s%>: He is <S%H7689>excellent<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>; And in <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H7230>plenteous<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> he will not <S%H6031>afflict<s%>.
Men <S%H582><s%> do therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H7200>him<s%>: He regardeth not any that are <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
